It hadn't crossed Francona's mind that the next win was No. 2,000 for his career as a manager. “Not even a little bit," Francona play-67 Game Recap play-68 Condensed Game Watch Archive carousel-arrow-right-200 Player of the Game Player of the Game Friedl 2-3 HR, BB, HBP +15.7% WPA See Leaderboard arrow-next-4 Top Performers Friedl 2 - 3 HR, BB, HBP, RBI, 3 R Martinez, N W, 5.1 IP 5 H, 2 ER, 3 SO Farmer, K 1 - 2 BB, R Team Comparison R H HR TB SB LOB E Rockies 2 7 0 7 0 8 2 Reds 4 10 1 15 1 10 0 Data Visualizations play-70 A deep dive into TJ Friedl's home run 00:11 play-71 TJ Friedl: Home Run Statcast Analysis 00:13 play-72 Breaking down Austin Gomber's pitches 00:04 play-73 Breaking down Nick Martinez's pitches 00:04 play-74 Nick Martinez's outing against the Rockies 00:27 play-75 Starting lineups for Rockies at Reds - July 13, 2025 00:10 play-76 Bench availability for Colorado, July 13 vs Reds 00:08 play-77 Fielding alignment for Colorado, July 13 vs Reds 00:11 play-78 Bench availability for Cincinnati, July 13 vs Rockies 00:08 carousel-arrow-right-100 More Coverage Rockies take Ethan Holliday, son of franchise great, at No. 4 overall Rockies select college trio to round out Day 1 of 2025 Draft Reds wrap Day 1 of Draft with a pair of big righties Reds see massive growth ahead for 17-year-old Draft pick Hall 'Losing is not OK': Rockies ready to move onto better 2nd half Key Moments Scoring All Video Home Runs Strikeouts Hard Hit Balls Lead Changes Win Probability Swings Bottom 1st Bases. 2 - 1, 0 Outs Home Run TJ Friedl homers (9) on a fly ball to right field.
